Text:
Can somebody who owns the Final Fantasy IX (9) soundtrack PLEASE rip it with Exact Audio Copy and Secure Mode enabled, to lossless FLAC and make a torrent of it??

IT WOULD BE VERY MOUCH APPRICIATED!!

Sorry for writing that here.... it's just that I've been looking for it for nearly seven years now.. and it's impossible to find in a store (offline or online)... :(
